response.original_title: Crayon Shin-Chan: Fierceness That Invites Storm! Yakiniku Road of Honor
response.overview: Crayon Shin-chan: Fierceness That Invites Storm! Yakiniku Road of Honor is a fast-paced road trip comedy in which Shin-chan and the Nohara family are falsely accused and forced to flee. What begins as a simple desire for yakiniku turns into a series of absurd chases, eccentric enemies, and relentless humor, while subtly highlighting the strength of family bonds and togetherness.
response.tagline: Run, Shin-chan! The Nohara family is wanted?
response.title: Crayon Shin-Chan: Fierceness That Invites Storm! Yakiniku Road of Honor

titles.title: Eiga Crayon Shin-chan: Arashi wo Yobu Eikou no Yakiniku Road
Kureyon Shin-chan: Arashi o Yobu: Eikō no Yakiniku Rōdo
Crayon Shin-chan: The Storm Called: Yakiniku Road of Honor
